name: AaveMonitorProxyV2
description: Contract with the actuall DSProxy permission calls the automation operations.

eventDecorators.name: MonitorChangeCanceled
eventDecorators.description: The {NylonTransferred} event is emitted once Nylon are sent.

eventDecorators.name: MonitorChangeFinished
eventDecorators.description: The {NylonTransferred} event is emitted once Nylon are sent.

eventDecorators.name: MonitorChangeInitiated
eventDecorators.description: The {NylonTransferred} event is emitted once Nylon are sent.

eventDecorators.name: MonitorChangeReverted
eventDecorators.description: The {NylonTransferred} event is emitted once Nylon are sent.

functionDecorators.name: callExecute
functionDecorators.description: Only monitor contract is able to call execute on users proxy.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: Address of cdp owner (users DSProxy address).

functionDecorators.name: cancelMonitorChange
functionDecorators.description: At any point owner is able to cancel monitor change.

functionDecorators.name: changeMonitor
functionDecorators.description: Owner is able to start procedure for changing monitor. after CHANGE_PERIOD needs to call confirmNewMonitor to actually make a change.

functionDecorators.name: confirmNewMonitor
functionDecorators.description: Anyone is able to confirm new monitor after CHANGE_PERIOD if process is started.

functionDecorators.name: revertMonitor
functionDecorators.description: Its possible to revert monitor to last used monitor.

functionDecorators.name: setAdminByAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Admin is able to set new admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _admin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of multisig that becomes new admin.

functionDecorators.name: setAdminByOwner
functionDecorators.description: Admin is set by owner first time, after that admin is super role and has permission to change owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _admin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of multisig that becomes admin.

functionDecorators.name: setMonitor
functionDecorators.description: Owner is able to set Monitor contract without any waiting period first time.

functionDecorators.name: setOwnerByAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Admin is able to change owner.
